title: Which L2 should t3rm.dev expand to?
body:
Mainnet will always be the home for the most collectible, **rare** t3rm.dev packages. We also want to support developers looking for higher bandwidth and lower fees.

Which chain should we expand to next, and which values should we use in the constructor?

---
- +/- 1% corresponds to an `_updateAmt` value of `100`
- 1 NFT/d corresponds to an `_updateFreq` value of `5760`
- 10 NFTs/d corresponds to an `_updateFreq` value of `576`
- FREE minting corresponds to a `_mintFee` value of `0`
---

### Smart Contract:
https://etherscan.io/address/0x4655f41dea823d556f237dc23691a748b7ea5697#code
